alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 12:48PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Holt and central Boyd Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Stuart to 7 miles southeast of Atkinson to 7 miles northeast of Chambers. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Spencer, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Lynch, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Opportunity, Spencer Dam, Midway, Dorsey, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 277 and 313. Highway 281 between mile markers 178 and 218. Highway 12 between mile markers 104 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
